text: @realDonaldTrump According to an analysis by the US Veterans Health Administration, hydroxychloroquine does not bring any use to the treatment of COVID-19 patients in US Veterans Hospitals, but has a higher risk of death. The drug has been recommended by Trump several times to treat COVID-19.
